ja482:1.3: Yo → ko (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | migamakkhāti → … makkhāsi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja482:6.3: Soyaṁ → so hi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja482:10.3: Hanāmi taṁ mittadubbhiṁ akiccakāriṁ → hanāmi mittaddu'makiccakāriṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja482:16.2: raṭṭhañcāpi vinassatu → mā maṁ janapado ahu (sya1ed, sya2ed)
